item.description:
RSVPS are closed. Red Sox Natives thank everyone for their support.

Tuesday is the last day that $15.00 tickets and raffle entry can be purchased for this event. RSVPs close at 9pm. Limited tickets available for $20.00 at the door.

For those of you who want something a bit different, here is your chance to join the Red Sox Natives and Wally The Green Monster for a Happy Hour at The Bleacher Bar. Please purchase your tickets on-line in advance as tickets have now been made available to other groups and the general public.

RAFFLE PRIZE - Day Trip for 2 from Games Away Tours Inc. to New York's Citi Field with Mets vs Cardinals Game Tickets on Thursday, July 29 (motorcoach transportation) just added. Purchase a ticket for this event from the Redsoxnatives.com and you are entered into the raffle. Purchase tickets for friends and receive additional entries. You do not need to be present to win the raffle.

This is a private event coordinated by the Red Sox Natives and one of their Organizers, Beth who runs the Bleacher Bar, so come out and support one of their more unique events.

The Red Sox will be out of town playing Cleveland at 7:05 pm and the game will be shown throughout the Bleacher bar.

The Details for this event:

-Arrive at 6:30 pm before Wally arrives at 7 pm
(He will be off leash so there is no telling what he may do to a late arrival.)
-Light food/apps will be provided (Included in the cost)
-Includes a hot dog buffet
-You receive a Wally photo card
-Take your own photo with Wally
-Wally is a popular Monster and commands an appearance fee. The charge for this event goes toward securing his Wallyness and the appetizers.
-cash bar
-bleacher bar menu available to order from
-stay and watch Celtics vs Lakers Game 4 at 9 pm too!

Sponsors and Give-Aways are currently being added for this event.

RAFFLE & GIVEAWAYS -

-Games Away Tours Inc Day Trip for 2 to New York Citi Field for Mets vs Cardinals with Game Tickets for Thursday, July 29. Motorcoach Transportation is included.

-$50.00 Gift Card from our host, The Bleacher Bar
-Red Sox Natives Author Steve Masse will be giving away a copy of his just released book "Short Circus" Summer time reading at its best!
-50 Fenway Stickers from sponsor SupahFans Streetware who will be at The Bleacher Bar
-Christopher Klien will be giving away a copy of his book "A Die-Hard Sports Fans Guide to Boston"
-Autographed Keith Lockhart CD of Red Sox Music
-Sam Adams Swag Bag
-Special guests


The Red Sox Natives are offering this event at a starting cost of $15.00 per person in advance (cash bar) and is subject to increase as the RSVPs increase. (More Wally time and apps) So get in cheap and early! Tickets will be $20.00 at the door if available.

A portion of the remaining profits may be donated to a charity of the Natives To Be Named Later.

In order to attend you must purchase a ticket in advance on line from the Redsoxnatives.com or from a Native member.

Space is limited.

For more information on the Red Sox Natives Meetup, go to

See you there,

Fenway Frank and all of the Red Sox Natives Organizers
item.how_to_find_us: Reserved Section of The Bleacher Bar
item.name: Happy Hour with WALLY! and Red Sox Natives at the Bleacher Bar
